front.title: An Extensible Markup Language (XML) Configuration Access Protocol (XCAP) Usage for XML Documents Directory

abstract.t: The general assumption of XCAP is that a client selects a document in a XCAP server in order to manipulate data. This requires the XCAP client to know the path of the XCAP-manipulatable XML document stored in the XCAP server. This specification allows an XCAP client to retrieve its directory of XCAP-manipulatable XML documents from an XCAP server.
